body_html:
This because tf.matmul does not have a GPU kernel for integer matrix multiplication. If you change those to float32 it should be placed on the GPU.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/matmul_op.cc#L377
body_text:
This because tf.matmul does not have a GPU kernel for integer matrix multiplication. If you change those to float32 it should be placed on the GPU.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/matmul_op.cc#L377
body:
This because tf.matmul does not have a GPU kernel for integer matrix multiplication. If you change those to float32 it should be placed on the GPU.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/matmul_op.cc#L377
